channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Team USA faces tough Canadian squad in Olympic gold medal hockey game
item.description: In the first Olympics with stars of the NHL competing in over a decade, a talent-packed Team USA faces a tough test against Canada.
item.content:encoded:
In the first Olympics with stars of the NHL competing in over a decade, a talent-packed Team USA faces a tough test against Canada.

(Image credit: Petr David Josek)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: PHOTOS: Your car has a lot to say about who you are
item.description: Photographer Martin Roemer visited 22 countries — from the U.S. to Senegal to India — to show how our identities are connected to our mode of transportation.
item.content:encoded:
Photographer Martin Roemer visited 22 countries — from the U.S. to Senegal to India — to show how our identities are connected to our mode of transportation.

(Image credit: Martin Roemers)
item.dc:creator: Kamala Thiagarajan

item.title: Looking for life purpose? Start with building social ties
item.description: Research shows that having a sense of purpose can lower stress levels and boost our mental health. Finding meaning may not have to be an ambitious project.
item.content:encoded:
Research shows that having a sense of purpose can lower stress levels and boost our mental health. Finding meaning may not have to be an ambitious project.

(Image credit: Bojan89)
item.dc:creator: Rhitu Chatterjee

item.title: Danish military evacuates U.S. submariner who needed urgent medical care off Greenland
item.description: Denmark's military says its arctic command forces evacuated a crew member of a U.S. submarine off the coast of Greenland for urgent medical treatment.
item.content:encoded:
Denmark's military says its arctic command forces evacuated a crew member of a U.S. submarine off the coast of Greenland for urgent medical treatment.

(Image credit: Bo Amstrup)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Only a fraction of House seats are competitive. Redistricting is driving that lower
item.description: Primary voters in a small number of districts play an outsized role in deciding who wins Congress. The Trump-initiated mid-decade redistricting is driving that number of competitive seats even lower.
item.content:encoded:
Primary voters in a small number of districts play an outsized role in deciding who wins Congress. The Trump-initiated mid-decade redistricting is driving that number of competitive seats even lower.

(Image credit: Kayla Bartkowski)
item.dc:creator: Ashley Lopez

item.title: Homeland Security suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs
item.description: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is suspending the TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs as a partial government shutdown continues.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is suspending the TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs as a partial government shutdown continues.

(Image credit: Ronda Churchill)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Crews recover bodies of all 9 skiers killed in California avalanche
item.description: The bodies of all the skiers who died in Tuesday's avalanche near Lake Tahoe have been recovered, authorities said Saturday. Intense winter storm conditions delayed search and recovery efforts.
item.content:encoded:
The bodies of all the skiers who died in Tuesday's avalanche near Lake Tahoe have been recovered, authorities said Saturday. Intense winter storm conditions delayed search and recovery efforts.

(Image credit: Godofredo A. Vásquez/AP)
item.dc:creator: Kristin Wright

item.title: FCC calls for more 'patriotic, pro-America' programming in run-up to 250th anniversary
item.description: The "Pledge America Campaign" urges broadcasters to focus on programming that highlights "the historic accomplishments of this great nation from our founding through the Trump Administration today."
item.content:encoded:
The "Pledge America Campaign" urges broadcasters to focus on programming that highlights "the historic accomplishments of this great nation from our founding through the Trump Administration today."

(Image credit: Mark Wilson)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: NASA's Artemis II lunar mission may not launch in March after all
item.description: NASA says an "interrupted flow" of helium to the rocket system could require a rollback to the Vehicle Assembly Building. If it happens, NASA says the launch to the moon would be delayed until April.
item.content:encoded:
NASA says an "interrupted flow" of helium to the rocket system could require a rollback to the Vehicle Assembly Building. If it happens, NASA says the launch to the moon would be delayed until April.

(Image credit: Gregg Newton)
item.dc:creator: Russell Lewis

item.title: Mississippi health system shuts down clinics statewide after ransomware attack
item.description: The attack was launched on Thursday and prompted hospital officials to close all of its 35 clinics across the state.
item.content:encoded:
The attack was launched on Thursday and prompted hospital officials to close all of its 35 clinics across the state.

(Image credit: Rogelio V. Solis)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise
